item.title: Temporal in Practice: From Saga Pattern to Self-Healing Distributed Transactions
item.description: While building a trading system backend, I used Temporal to solve the classic distributed transaction consistency problem. This post breaks down Temporal’s core mechanisms and explores its applications in AI task scheduling.
